# NSScrubber.Mode

**Enumeration**

The scrolling behavior for a scrubber.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Mode
```

## Overview

Scrolling is either *fixed* or *free*. For details on how to choose the correct scrolling mode for your app, see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrubber#Choose-a-scrubber-touch-interaction-model].

## Constants

- **NSScrubber.Mode.fixed**: A scrolling mode in which scrubber items remain fixed in place, and the item under the user’s finger is highlighted.
- **NSScrubber.Mode.free**: A scrolling mode in which the scrubber scrolls as the user swipes horizontally across the scrubber.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Changing the layout

- **scrubberLayout**: An object used to describe the layout of items within the scrubber.
- **mode**: A setting that determines whether interaction with the scrubber is fixed or free.
- **itemAlignment**: A setting that specifies the snapping behavior of items in the scrubber.
- **NSScrubber.Alignment**: The specified preferred alignment of items within the scrubber, when they come to rest following a user’s scrolling or paging interaction.
- **isContinuous**: A Boolean value that, together with the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrubber/mode-swift.property] property, determines scrubber interaction style.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
